backend/main.mo: Imports the migration module and runs it in an empty actor.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old persistent state types and a no-op migration run function.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and dark mode styles configuring app-wide colors and layout.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication layout, and routes for all app modules.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Authenticated layout with header navigation, demo badge, user info, logout, and footer.
frontend/src/components/DemoSessionIndic: Simple badge showing a Demo Mode indicator.
frontend/src/components/timetable/Timeta: Form for creating or editing timetable entries with fields for course, day, time, and location.
frontend/src/components/timetable/Weekly: Displays timetable entries grouped by day with edit and delete controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMockSession.tsx: Implements a mock user session stored in localStorage with login/logout and a React context provider.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and basic global styling.
frontend/src/lib/date.ts: Utility functions to convert between Date objects and bigint timestamps in nanoseconds.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Provides typed helpers for saving and loading various campus data sets to localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/ratings.ts: Computes average rating from an array of place reviews.
frontend/src/lib/summarizer.ts: Extracts action-focused summary sentences from email text using keyword and pattern detection.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for frontend models like menus, posts, listings, trips, places, and timetables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/academic-cockpit/Acad: Manages a user's weekly timetable, allowing adding, editing, and deleting class entries stored in local storage.
frontend/src/pages/daily-pulse/DailyPuls: Provides a mess menu manager and email summarizer, storing menus by date and generating summaries from user-input text.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with links to core modules, each displayed as a feature card.
frontend/src/pages/explorers-guide/Place: Displays detailed info for a place and lets logged-in users submit reviews, updating stored place data.
Shows a list of places with average ratings and supports adding new places via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/MockLoginPage.tsx: Provides a demo login screen using mock sessions, allowing name entry or preset selection before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/student-exchange/lost: Shows details of a lost/found post, including status and timestamp, with navigation back to the list.
Renders the Lost & Found list with a dialog to create new posts stored in localStorage and navigates to post details.
frontend/src/pages/student-exchange/mark: Displays details for a marketplace listing fetched from localStorage, with fallback UI if not found.
Shows sortable marketplace listings, provides a dialog to create new listings, and supports navigation to listing details.
frontend/src/pages/student-exchange/Stud: Landing page linking to Lost & Found, Marketplace, and Travel Sharing sections.
frontend/src/pages/student-exchange/trav: Lists travel-sharing trips, allows creating new trips, and lets users join or leave trips persisted in localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin settings for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s current state, requirements, known issues, and feature implementation progress.
